text: Igor Petrović (Serbian Cyrillic: Игор Петровић ; born 18 March 1987 in Belgrade) is a Serbian footballer who plays for Moravac Mrštane. ==References== * Profile and stats at Srbijafudbal. * Imscouting * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kruševac Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Napredak Kruševac players Category:FK Mladost Lučani players Category:FK Moravac Mrštane players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Temnić players
title: Igor Petrović
